summary: Psilocybe semilanceata, or magic mushrooms, are fungi with special chemicals called psilocybin and psilocin, which can make people see and feel things that aren't real. These mushrooms are found in many places and have been used for a long time, maybe even by ancient people in art and sculptures. They are potent and sometimes used as drugs for fun. Some common types are P. azurescens and P. cyanescens.
title: Psilocybin mushroom
